name: places/ChIJJfQ0YIlYwokRGF9srZoIafQ
formattedAddress: 117 W 74th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 117 W 74th St, New York, NY 10023-2236, USA

originalText.text: Phyllis of Follow My Lead is a legend on the UWS for dog training and I am so grateful to know her and to have her expertise while training my Tibetan Terrier puppy. I got my puppy at 6 months old and under Phyllis' guidance, my puppy quickly mastered proper leash training/walking, introductions to other dogs, and masterful house training - all through positive reinforcement and patience. Phyllis is kind, responsive, and gracious with her time. If you are on the UWS and needing a dog trainer, I HIGHLY recommend Phyllis!

text.text: Phyllis of Follow My Lead is a legend on the UWS for dog training and I am so grateful to know her and to have her expertise while training my Tibetan Terrier puppy. originalText.text:
Phyllis is quite the extraordinary trainer. Not merely because she’s skilled, smart and uncannily intuitive about dogs, but because she’s all those things for frazzled, overwrought new puppy owners.  We had a new puppy whom we wanted to keep wee wee pad trained and Phyllis – with her copious and precise instructions and emotional support on the phone and in emails  - was our steady hand while we worked to train him.

Once you go to Phyllis’s classes or have her over for privates, she’s in your camp. She’s got your back, rooting for you and always there to guide you. She seems to do it for the sheer love of dogs but also because she’s just a really good person. She’s got the same commitment for older dogs too.

Walking around the city with Phyllis is like seeing her gallery of smart, happy kids who managed to grow up and become well-adjusted.  Except they’re dogs. She’s a gem. Like nobody else you’ll find in this city.

originalText.text: New York City and the Upper West Side are so lucky to have Phyllis and Follow My Lead for puppy training and dog training classes and private training! She uses modern and positive methods that make training fun for the dog, the owner, and the whole family!

text.text: New York City and the Upper West Side are so lucky to have Phyllis and Follow My Lead for puppy training and dog training classes and private training! She uses modern and positive methods that make training fun for the dog, the owner, and the whole family!

originalText.text:
I signed myself and my 4.5 year old dog Maddie up for Follow My Lead's Level 1 group class. We've had years of training, but there was still a lot to improve for both of us. Follow My Lead uses a reward-based method of dog training that I had not learned or used before.

Every other class or one-on-one was about snapping the leash or a pinch collar. Positive reinforcement training was a huge shift for us that turned out to be so much better then any previous method. She responded quickly to the new training and her focus is so much better. In just six weeks there's been a huge improvement in her overall behavior and the specific issues we wanted to work on.

Class sizes are smaller so there is a lot of one-on-one time with the trainers. In our class there was one instructor (Phyllis) and two teaching assistants so you really get the time and attention you need to make the most out of every class.

Highly recommend! The price is a steal for how much hands-on attention you get, and the results that happen because of their method.
